title.value: University of Texas Diabetic Foot Ulcer Grade Classification System value set

description.value: The set of codes that define specialized diabetic foot ulcer grades according to the University of Texas system. These are temporary codes and will be replaced by Solor SNOMED CT codes when available.

copyright.value: Used by permission of HL7 International, all rights reserved Creative Commons License

display.value: Grade 0 – pre-or postulcerative site that has healed
Grade 1 – superficial wound not involving tendon, capsule, or bone
Grade 2 – wound penetrating to tendon or capsule
Grade 3 – wound penetrating bone or joint
